brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of the study was to validate tools of physiological signal processing and
      interpretation on healthy human volunteers in order to improve the understanding in
      respiratory physiology and its interactions with heart function, and swallowing.

clinical_study.brief_title: Validation of Study in Respiratory Physiology and it Interactions

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  healthy subject

          -  between 18 and 60 years old

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  patient

          -  person protected by the law

intervention.intervention_name: Non-invasive physiological signal recording on healthy volunteer

clinical_study.official_title: Validation of Tools Studying Respiratory Physiology and it Interaction With Swallowing and Cardiac Physiology.

oversight_info.authority: France: Agence Nationale de Sécurité du Médicament et des produits de santé

primary_outcome.description: Heart rate is calculated on electrocardiograph
primary_outcome.time_frame: one measure within two weeks of inclusion

primary_outcome.description: end tidal CO2 of each breath measured with an infrared CO2 analyzer
